title: Basically what the new Poppy rework is..

embed.description: "Later bitch" Basically what the new Poppy rework's ult is.

body:
This is probably what it feels like when a reworked Poppy ults you.

{{sticker:zombie-nunu-bummed}}

replies.body:
I bet it also feels like this when your with your teammates.
https://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mb6nl1D5aU1rywyu8o1_500.gif

> [{quoted}](name=Bow hunter 16,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=a7y3uB69,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-12-02T07:23:45.548+0000)
>
> I bet it also feels like this when your with your teammates.
> https://45.media.tumblr.com/tumblr_mb6nl1D5aU1rywyu8o1_500.gE

As a Pokemon fan, I was actually going to draw that instead but then I saw the comments in her rework reveal and I was like "Oh..."
(Sobs in corner loudly)

Its alright, it could be worse... I mean you could be this guy:
http://i.imgur.com/HrrPmRE.jpg
At least he can admire what would be an amazing and terrifying view. The people on earth would die instantly. He can play in 1/12th the gravity while he waits to die.
